lead_paragraph: Samir Geagea, leader of the Lebanese Forces party, threw his support behind the presidential candidacy of Michel Aoun, whose Free Patriotic Movement is Hezbollah’s main Christian ally in Parliament.
snippet: Samir Geagea, leader of the Lebanese Forces party, threw his support behind the presidential candidacy of Michel Aoun, whose Free Patriotic Movement is Hezbollah’s main Christian ally in Parliament.

headline.main: In Surprise Move, Bitter Political Rivals in Lebanon Announce Deal
headline.print_headline: In Surprise Move, Bitter Political Rivals in Lebanon Announce Deal

abstract: Improbable alliance of rival Lebanese Christian politicians Samir Geagea and Michel Aoun revises religiously diverse country's complex political alignments amid increasing sectarian tension across Middle East.
